Hey, , or should I call you, "crafty-pants?"

No? Let's make a deal—you talk to {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} and take a few things off our "to craft" list, and I'll just call you from now on. Sound good?

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} called you what? I think "Your Royal Craftiness of Craftania Kingdom" more suits you.

Still not satisfied? Well, aren't you hard to please!

So——now that the Hand of Velika hazing portion of the day is over, how would you like to craft some items for {@LinkCreature:63#3001#Barian}? Great!

Look at these! They're so well crafted! I'd expect nothing less from craft royalty.

Ha! Word spreads fast through the Hands.

See {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} for more abuse, and your payment.
Make some krysteel ingots and bring them to me. It would be immensely helpful.

Nice work! Say, you wouldn't want to be the Hands of Velika court crafter, would you? No?

Sorry, Elthienne put me up to it. You're welcome here anytime.

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} has your payment.

Craft some deosilex and bring your finished work to me.

Thank you in advance, .

You're very good.

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} is good, too, but you're...better. Let's just leave it at that.

See your crafting competition for payment.

Craft some salisleather and bring it back here, would you?

Thanks, .

Thanks very much!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you for this fine work.

Craft some verdracloth and bring it to me.

Try not to have too much fun.

Not bad, . Not bad at all.

You should know that the Hands of Velika are very impressed with your work. Come back and see us any time!
